author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: قَدْ تُرِكَ المُقَرَّبُوْنَ فِي ظُلُمَاتِ الهِجْرَانِ أَيْنَ إِشْرَاقُ صُبْحِ وِصَالِكَ يَا مَقْصُوْدَ العَالَمِيْنَ *
translation: Those who are near unto Thee have been abandoned in the darkness of desolation: Where is the shining of the morn of Thy reunion, O Desire of the worlds?
